trans-unit.source: DeclarativeCatalogPartDesigner provides design-time support for <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.DeclarativeCatalogPart> controls.

It extends its parent class, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPartDesigner>, by adding a control-specific <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup> to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.DeclarativeCatalogPartDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A> collection.
DeclarativeCatalogPartDesigner does not render the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.DeclarativeCatalogPart> control on the design surface.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.DeclarativeCatalogPartDesigner"></xref> class.
Overrides the parent method to prevent rendering of the control.

If there is no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.DeclarativeCatalogPart.WebPartsTemplate%2A> associated with the control, the designer displays the standard gray box with the class name and instance name of the control.

Otherwise, no design-time rendering occurs at all because the check boxes and Web Parts titles are rendered by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPartChrome> instead of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.DeclarativeCatalogPart> itself.
Either an empty string ("") or the value of <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.DeclarativeCatalogPartDesigner.GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml*>.
Gets the markup to represent an empty control on the design surface.
This operation renders the control as a gray box showing the class name and the instance name.

Binds the designer to the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.DeclarativeCatalogPart"></xref> control and sets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.ViewFlags"></xref> view flag to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.DeclarativeCatalogPart"></xref> control associated with the designer.
Gets a collection of template groups, each containing one or more template definitions.
The TemplateGroups property overrides its base implementation to add a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup> object that is specific to this class.
The appended <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroupCollection"></xref> associated with this class.
